name: Signature Dish (GGJ 2019)
description:
Help Lil' Cheflet, the handy kitchen helper, to build your favourite meal. Select ingredients from your pantry, and cook up a storm in the kitchen! Once you've got everything ready, throw them into your dish and see how Lil' Cheflet interprets your masterpiece!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2019, which had the theme "What Does Home Mean To You?" - we decided to showcase how you can bring a little bit of home with you, wherever you go, by making your favourite meals.
Share your creations on twitter with the #SignatureDishGGJ hashtag!

Credits:

Code: @drmelon

Art: @tackyvillain

Made with Kyle Pulver's Otter2D framework!
